column5: I would like some info on golden fawn lodge on Lac Seul near Ear Falls,Ontario.Has anyone been to this lodge?Any info regarding quality of facilities,service,boats and motors,owners etc. would be appreciated.
We have aways had a good time there. Ted takes very good care of us. The place is always clean and every thing works!

We went there for about 6 years after about 15 at timberlane. Now we dont drive quite as far and go to LOTW. Barb is very nice and the cabins are too. if its just the husband and wife get the honeymoon cabin. Its off on the other side of the main lodge. small but nice. we always found the fishing very good around the bridge just down the way.
Just back from Golden Fawn. We had another great year of fishing and as usual Ted and Barb are very friendly and helpful. How was your trip to Golden Fawn ?
